name: 6.8 "Bidding on the Boys" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why was Cheers holding an auction?
questions.explanation:
For the Children's Hospital.

	The guys were auctioned off as dates to raise money for this charity. At first, Sam was not asked to be one of the guys auctioned off but he fought for it and got to be one of the guys.

questions.text: What drink did Frasier order for Lilith and himself?
questions.explanation:
champagne.

	This was before the two of them started fighting. Frasier made the mistake of asking Lilith to sign something.

questions.text: What did Frasier mention that upset Lilith?
options: he lived with another woman before living with Lilith
he was a Freudian and she was a Skinnertarian
questions.explanation:
a prenuptial agreement.

	All four of these things were true, but what had her upset in this episode was the fact that he asked her to sign a prenuptial agreement. We won't find out about Frasier's previous marriage until season 10.

options: a really white woman who needs a tan
questions.explanation:
a pig-headed witch.

	Frasier couldn't understand why Lilith was so upset about a prenuptial agreement. Later on, he understood that by asking her to sign one he was saying that he didn't think the marriage would work out.

questions.text: Who, from Cheers, participated in the auction besides Sam?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Woody was rather eager to do it once he found out what it was about. Sam however, was reluctant; at least he pretended to be reluctant. The truth was he really wanted to do it.

questions.text: How much money did the other man (not Sam) from Cheers get sold for in the auction?
questions.explanation:
$400.

	The goal was to raise $2000 for charity. Carla said with the money Woody won, Sam only had to raise $1600.

questions.text: What did Rebecca say she'd do if someone bid $1600 on Sam?
questions.correct: tattoo his name on her butt
questions.explanation:
tattoo his name on her butt.

	While Rebecca was the manager of Cheers, the bar was not hers to sell so she couldn't have bet that. Rebecca was one of the few women who were not smitten with Sam.

Lilith.

	Lilith wanted to get back at Frasier so she bid on Sam. Frasier was quite upset and felt like he was losing Lilith.

questions.text: Who did Frasier say Sam took from him in the past?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Sam replied, "And didn't God punish me for that." Frasier still seemed to have a hard time of getting over Diane leaving him at the altar.

questions.text: How did Lilith know Frasier would come to the Cape where she went with Sam?
questions.correct: She knew his mind as she knew her own.
options: She told Sam to tell Frasier to come.
She left him directions in his coat pocket.
She instructed Cliff to drive Frasier there.
questions.explanation:
She knew his mind as she knew her own.

	She said Frasier was the yin to her yang. She explained to Frasier the reason she bid on Sam was to get back at him for the prenuptial agreement.
